Reviews.Title: “Nice location and good for budget travelers”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel elysee etoile 3 nights june 2011 conveniently located near arc de triomphe plenty shops metro station nearby little dated travel budget wireless internet staff friendly

Reviews.Content: hotel located bathrooms amazingly clean sleeping size matter stayed totally 2 nights male receptionists friendly helpful lady counter mornings friendly
